"The Weapon Palette":
"You can add a combination of weapons and photon arts/techniques to the weapon palette to switch equipment easily.

Move palette up: <%PaletteReverse>
Move palette down: <%PaletteForce>"
"Use <%Decide> to equip a weapon and finish switching the weapon palette."

"The Weapon Palette has 2 Button mode and 3 Button mode.

In 2 Button mode, the Photon Arts and Techniques you can set vary depending on the weapon type.

For striking weapons, you can set Photon Arts to be used on the first, second and third parts of your combo.

Shooting weapons can set up to 3 Photon Arts, and teching weapons can set up to 4 Techniques."

"In the case of 3 Button mode, up to 6 Photon Arts and Techniques can be added to your Weapon Palette.

It allows for custom combinations with a focus on a manual play
style."
